mapper.select: select origin_id from dormitory_room where origin_school_id=#{schoolId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dormitory_room (origin_id,name,origin_dormitory_building_id,origin_school_id,origin_campus_id) VALUES
(#{item.originId},#{item.name},#{item.originDormitoryBuildingId},#{item.originSchoolId},#{item.originCampusId})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=VALUES(name), origin_dormitory_building_id=VALUES(origin_dormitory_building_id)
